messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for SIM verification issues.
I need to biometrically verify my SIM card, what is the process for it?
How do I go about biometric verification of my SIM?
What's required for biometric SIM verification?
Please visit our nearest franchise with the SIM and original CNIC for biometric verification.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for SIM management.
How can I disown my Telenor SIM?
What is the procedure to disown a Telenor SIM card?
Can I disown my SIM? If so, how?
If you want to disown your Telenor SIM, please visit our nearest franchise, with original CNIC and make sure the SIM activation date is at least 60 days old.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for SIM ownership inquiries.
How can I check my SIMâ€™s ownership details?
What's the method to find out who owns a SIM registered to my CNIC?
How do I verify the ownership of my SIM card?
Send a text message by typing 'MNP' from the same SIM number and send to 667 (Charges Rs. 2.39) or call our helpline on 345 (UAN number 042111345100) for SIM ownership information.
